alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 2:36AM CST until December 14 at 3:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 330 AM CST. * At 236 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fayette to near Natchez to 6 miles north of Big Bend, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Natchez, Vidalia, Fayette, Union Church, Stanton, Hamburg, Kingston, Black Hawk, Lorman, Sibley, Slocum, Mcbride, Cranfield, Stampley, Red Lick, Deer Park, Church Hill, Mcnair, Blue Hill and Kirby. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
